entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is the main character who woke up with a start and stared wildly around. She forgot to go to Charms class.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is Hermione's friend who told her it was not time for Divination yet and that she should have been in Charms class.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Hermione's friend who thinks she might be cracking up due to trying to do too much.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a person that Hermione was thinking about and lost track of things because of him.

entities.name: professor flitwick
entities.description: Professor Flitwick is the teacher of Charms class, who might have been angry with Hermione for missing his class.
